title: Fiskars Classic Loop Rotary Cutter for Fabric and Paper - 45mm - Paper Cutter for Arts and Crafts with Comfort Handle - steel and orange[packing may slightly vary]
description: By constantly seeking ways to improve creators’ pain points, Fiskars makes it easy for you to explore exciting new territory with simple, uniquely useful tools designed to last a lifetime. From cutting tools for sewing and quilting, including scissors and shears, to crafting tools ranging from stamps to stencils and more, our creating portfolio also includes new precision DIY tools for those working with more sophisticated materials, as well as paper cutting tools such as punches and trimmers, all designed to help you do what you do best: express yourself. Whether you want to create your own style or put a stamp on the place you call home, our intuitive, quality cutting tools are designed with your passion in mind.
